nodes.text: Republic Marshalls were the law enforcement presence on the planet Belsavis during the Cold War and subsequent Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Marshall Kay Cavarat served as the chief law enforcement officer for the Belsavis prison. The Marshalls administered the prison wardens who in turn commanded the prison guards. The Marshalls were also responsible for any law enforcement activity on the planet.
